div.t-attf-class: card mt-0 border-top-0 rounded-0 rounded-bottom #{classes if classes else ''}
form-group #{error and 'appointment_date' in error and 'has-error' or ''} col-xl-6
div.label: Appointment Date *

label.p: The selected appointment will be canceled.
You are going to confirm this appointment.

option.t-att-selected: country.id == int(country_id) if country_id else country.id == partner.country_id.id

div.p: Use the top button '+ New' to create an event.

header.t-attf-class: overflow-hidden bg-secondary #{opt_events_list_columns and 'col-12 rounded-top' or 'col-sm-4 col-lg-3 rounded-left'} #{(not opt_events_list_cards) and 'rounded shadow'} #{(not opt_events_list_cards and not opt_events_list_columns) and 'rounded-top'}

h5.t-attf-class: card-title mt-2 mb-0 text-truncate #{(not event.website_published) and 'text-danger'}

div.div: What would you like to be transfered as?
Only Members, Leagues or Leaders are allowed to Edit Their Profile.
Only Members, Leagues or Leaders are allowed to Add Attachments.
Only Members, Leagues or Leaders are allowed to Submit Complaints.
You Have A Transfer That Hasn't Been Reviewed Yet. Please Wait Until A Decision Is Made.
Only Members, Leagues or Leaders are allowed to ask for a Transfer.
What would you like to be transfered as?
Only Those Members Who Are Also Leagues are allowed to transfer as Leagues
Only Those Leaders Who Are Also Leagues are allowed to transfer as Leagues

div.p:
To schedule an appointment please,
Sign Up or
Sign In to access this page.

t.p: Your Appointment has been scheduled for .

div.div: Your Profile Has Been Successfully Updated!

div.p: How did you find out about As?
How often do you use or access the system?
Please rate your level of satisfaction with the project
Do you have any suggestions to improve this activity?

form.class: custom-form consulting-form bg-white shadow-lg mb-5 mb-lg-0

div.h5:
Thank you for your time. We have received your feedback.
back
